description: “The No.1 problem with the Volcker Rule is it’s too complicated and people don’t know how to interpret it,” said Steven Mnuchin, Donald Trump’s pick for Treasury.
title: Trump’s Picks for Treasury and Commerce
title_page: Trump’s Picks for Treasury and Commerce - Video - NYTimes.com
text: “The No.1 problem with the Volcker Rule is it’s too complicated and people don’t know how to interpret it,” said Steven Mnuchin, Donald Trump’s pick for Treasury.
